about.description1: , I am a {age} years old french developer. I am passionate about programming and I am always looking for new challenges.
about.description2: It all started when I was 12 years old, I discovered the world of programming and I immediately fell in love with it. I started with Javascript, with create Discord bot, and then I discovered the world of development with Java, Dart, etc..
about.description3: I love to create new things, I'm was working on a minecraft server called Conodia but it close, and I'm also in a Discord's bot framework project called
about.description4: I am currently studying at a high school in France, and here my goal is to become a software engineer. I am also a freelancer and I am always looking for new projects to work on.
about.stacks: Here what are my lovelies stacks:

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: A selection of my most significant projects

exprefrei.title: Expr'efrei
exprefrei.description: A student association project at Efrei Paris

text.intro: Expr'efrei is a student project developed as part of my studies at Efrei Paris. This project demonstrates my ability to work in a team and deliver quality solutions.
text.feature1Text: This project was developed in collaboration with other students, allowing us to practice teamwork and agile methodology.
text.feature2Text: The project allowed me to deepen my knowledge in modern web technologies and apply the concepts learned during my training.
text.conclusion: This experience reinforced my passion for development and my desire to create innovative solutions.

conodia.title: Conodia
conodia.description: Innovative Minecraft server with custom plugins

text.intro: The Conodia project is an innovative Minecraft server designed and developed by Jules Lofficial. This project stands out for its technical complexity and high level of customization, offering a unique experience for players.
text.feature1Text: Jules created all the Minecraft plugins for the server, introducing more than 95 commands available from the very beginning. These plugins were custom-built to meet the specific needs of the server.
text.feature2Text: A RESTful web API and a WebSocket system were developed to connect the Minecraft server to Discord bots. This allows seamless interaction between the game and the Discord platform.
text.feature3Text: At its launch, the server recorded over 95 players connected simultaneously, demonstrating the project's initial popularity.
text.conclusion: This project reflects Jules' technical skills and his ability to create a fun and immersive experience for a gaming community.

mineral.title: Mineral
mineral.description: Discord bot framework built with Dart

text.intro: The Mineral project is an application development initiative where Baptiste Parmentier and Jules Lofficial worked together. This project focuses on creating advanced Discord bots using Dart.
text.feature1Text: Jules and Baptiste collaborated to develop Discord bots with tailored features and robust functionality. These bots are created using Dart, ensuring efficient and scalable performance.
text.feature2Text: The project leverages a unique framework specifically designed for Discord bot development. This framework enables faster development cycles.
text.conclusion: This project showcases the ability to leverage modern technologies like Dart to build tools that enrich the Discord community experience.
